name: 10 Average Questions about TO After Joey and Rachel Kiss

questions.text: Who was the first person to hear Rachel and Joey in the bedroom?
questions.explanation:
Phoebe.

	Phoebe: "Rachel and Joey! It's Rachel and Joey!"

questions.text: Which 'Little Rascal' did Chandler refer to Monica as?
Which Sandra Bullock movie was Chandler obsessed with throughout this episode?
questions.explanation:
'Miss Congeniality'.

	Monica: "Honey, if you know it through a wall, you know it too well!"

questions.text: What did Monica have the salon style her hair in?
Joey told Ross about him and Rachel.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ross was going on about how Joey could become his new best friend.

questions.text: Who pulled Joey into the other room after Ross started knocking?
questions.explanation:
Chandler.

	Chandler pulled Joey into their room while Rachel was looking for a place to hide him.

Precious.

	Phoebe: "Is she a purebreed or did you pick her up at the pound?"

questions.text: How many bottles of shampoo did Rachel say Ross took from the hotel?
Did Monica agree to get rid of her hairstyle?
Ross walked in on Rachel and Joey kissing.
